snippet: Ambitious development plans for the 2016 Summer Olympics, as well as the 2014 soccer World Cup, involve large-scale evictions from numerous slums, whose residents are refusing to leave.
abstract: Ambitious development plans for the 2016 Summer Olympics, as well as the 2014 soccer World Cup, to be held in Rio De Janeiro, involve large-scale evictions from numerous slums, whose residents are refusing to leave; squatters have been a thorn in the side of the government for months, taking their fight to the courts and the streets.

byline.contributor: Erika O’Conor and Taylor Barnes contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Ambitious development plans for the 2016 Summer Olympics, as well as the 2014 soccer World Cup, involve large-scale evictions from numerous slums, whose residents are refusing to leave.

headline.seo: Brazil Faces Obstacles in Preparations for Rio Olympics
headline.main: Slum Dwellers Are Defying Brazil’s Grand Design for Olympics
headline.print_headline: Slum Dwellers Are Defying Brazil’s Grand Design for Olympics
